description: This table contains statement history information for the guarantor account.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: STMT_HX_STMT_DATE
columns.description: The date on which statement was generated.

columns.name: STMT_HX_INVOICE_NUM
columns.description: The invoice number of the invoice that was sent to the guarantor on this date.

columns.name: STMT_HX_NEW_CHARGE
columns.description: The original amount of all new charges on this invoice. New charges are those that were not on the last invoice sent.

columns.name: STMT_HX_NEW_BALANCE
columns.description: The new balance on the statement.

columns.name: STMT_HX_TTL_PMT
columns.description: Total payment amount on the statement.

columns.name: STMT_HX_TTL_DB_ADJ
columns.description: Total debit adjustment amount on the statement.

columns.name: STMT_HX_TTL_CR_ADJ
columns.description: Total credit adjustment amount on the statement.

columns.name: STMT_HX_TTL_AMT_HLD
columns.description: Total amount held on the statement.

columns.name: STMT_HX_TTL_AMT_VD
columns.description: Total amount voided since last statement.

columns.name: STMT_HX_DVRY_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The statement delivery method category ID for the guarantor.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Paper, No Electronic Notification


Paperless, No Electronic Notification


Paper and Electronic Notification


Paperless, Electronic Notification

columns.name: STMT_HX_LST_VW_DTTM
columns.description: Last date/time when the statement was most recently access from MyChart.

columns.name: STMT_HX_1ST_VW_DTTM
columns.description: The date/time when the statement was first accessed from MyChart.

columns.name: STMT_HX_WHY_2_PR_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason type why the paperless statement is forced to paper statement.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Paperless statement disabled


Guarantor type not included


Guarantor excluded by rule


Lack of payments


Statement not shown in MyChart
